###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlToolbar_SetButtonText

###Description###
Sets the display text of a button

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiToolBar.au3>
_GUICtrlToolbar_SetButtonText($hWnd, $iCommandID, $sText)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to the control
$iCommandID
	Button command ID
$sText
	Button text
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: True
Failure: False

###Remarks###
None.
